name: DrivingMania [BETA]
description:
Get ready to rev up your engines and hit the open road in the ultimate driving experience! In this open-world driving simulator game, you'll be transported to a sprawling Slavic-inspired map where adventure and excitement await around every turn.

With a dynamic day/night cycle, you'll be able to explore this vast world at any time, whether you want to soak up the vibrant colors of a sunrise or take in the neon glow of the city at night. But the real thrill of this game comes from the freedom to choose your own path. Will you take on quests and missions earn rewards, or simply cruise around to discover different places.

No matter what you choose, you'll have access to an impressive selection of cars, each with its own unique style. Customize your vehicles to your heart's content by giving your ride a fresh coat of paint! It's all up to you!

As you explore this incredible world, you'll be treated to an amazing soundtrack featuring some of the best music around. Tune in to Slavic FM for a taste of the local culture, jam out to classic hits on Nostalgia radio, or get pumped up with the latest beats on NCS radio.

So what are you waiting for? Get ready to hit the road and experience the ultimate driving adventure in this open-world driving simulator game!

----------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: This game is still in BETA mode. You may expect bugs/glitches along the way. If you find any, please contact us at duckmastersbusiness@gmail.com as this will help us out a lot! More updates coming soon! We would also like to hear your feedback in the comments!

Controls:

  • WASD = Movement
  • SPACE = Handbrake
  • R = Respawn(Flip)
  • ESC = Pause Game
  • M = Map
